title: WIND ENERGY CONVERSION SYSTEMS – Adds to existing law to require the installation of light-mitigating technology systems on wind energy conversion systems.
subject: ELECTRICITY AND ELECTRICIANS
ENERGY
NATURAL RESOURCES
SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
